name: First Class Room
description: Experience luxury at its finest in our First Class Room. This spacious 45m² sanctuary features elegant modern décor, a plush king-size bed, and floor-to-ceiling windows offering breathtaking city views. The marble bathroom includes a rain shower and deep soaking tub. Complimentary high-speed WiFi and 24-hour room service ensure a perfect stay.

name: Deluxe Room
description: Our Deluxe Room offers sophisticated comfort in a 35m² space. Featuring contemporary furnishings, a comfortable queen-size bed, and large windows with scenic views. The well-appointed bathroom comes with premium amenities. Perfect for both business and leisure travelers, the room includes a work desk, high-speed internet, and flat-screen TV.

name: Suite Room
description: Indulge in the ultimate luxury of our 60m² Suite Room. This premium accommodation features a separate living area, bedroom with a king-size bed, and a private balcony. The spacious marble bathroom includes both a rainfall shower and standalone bathtub. Enjoy exclusive access to our executive lounge, personalized concierge service, and premium in-room amenities.
